title: mugleproject
author: mugleproject
created_time: February 05, 2023, 11:05:15 AMLast edit: March 09, 2023, 01:24:04 PM by mugleproject
content: Mugle Smart Chain Fact Sheet：Mugle Smart Chain is a smart contract blockchain that provides programmability compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM). Designed to run in parallel with mugle chain, Mugle Smart Chain adds smart contract functions to create assets on the chain and determine its purpose and usage rules. Assets created on Mugle Smart Chain are easier to use and protected by open source code rather than a centralized organization.Mugle Smart Chain forked from the Ethereum code base, and modifications to the supply function.Mugle Smart Chain specs- Algorithm: Ethash- Block Time: 12 Second- Block Reward: 50000 MUGLEToken distribution- Team allocation 6000000000- Foundation allocation 6000000000Mugle Smart Chain background- Website https://mugle.org/- Mugle genesis topic  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406583.0

comments.body: Quote from: gameparadise007 on February 05, 2023, 02:13:40 PMHello Dev,I mined some Mugle coin. So what will happen to them?The coins of mugle chain and mugle smart chain can be transferred to each other through the cross-chain protocol in the future.
